opener.dateline:
431 Stevens st.Street
Cor West.
Camden,
N.New Jersey, July 1, '74
opener.salute: Hon. Geo H. Williams, Attorney General.

body.p: Yours of June 30, informing me of the necessity of terminating my services in the Solicitor's office, Treasury, is respectfully acknowledged.
I see that the dismissed clerks in the Treasury, &c. are to have two months extra pay, (July & August.) Can this allowance be made to me?
